synopsis.text: One half a century has elapsed since the magical escapades of Hakushon Daimaou. The grandson of Kan-chan, Kantarou Yodayama, encounters Akubi, an aspiring queen, as she embarks on a quest to refine her royal skills. Together, they navigate the complexities of the human realm, undertake various jobs, and uncover the profound significance of nurturing dreams. However, the modern world presents unexpected challenges, and Akubi's eccentric family adds a comical twist to their already intricate journey. Prepare for a delightful blend of humor, adventure, and heartwarming lessons in this enchanting anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
